content: **free** *when you download one of my free patterns please consider making a small donation to your favorite charity thank you * ❤️❤️❤️ the bookmark can be worked in any thin crochet cotton and the hook size will vary accordingly if you choose the scheepjes maxi sweet treat i recommend a 1 25-1 5mm hook depending on how dense you would like the pattern to be follow me on instagram for new pattern releases sales and discount codes **@torunjcrochet**
